hadiths.text: Jabir reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who saw me in sleep in fact saw me, for it is not possible for the satan to appear in my form; and he also said: When any one of you sees a hulm he should not inform anyone, for it is a sort of vain sport of devil in the state of sleep

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " مَنْ رَآنِي فِي الْمَنَامِ فَقَدْ رَآنِي "
chapter.eng-name: The Words Of The Prophet (ﷺ): "Whoever Sees Me In A Dream Has Indeed Seen Me."
